item.title: Plonky2
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Plonky2 is a non-Interactive Proof of Proof of Knowledge (NIPoPoK) chain developed to reduce the size of the blockchain and speed up transaction confirmations.
